actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide Public Housing Authorities with waivers of the procedures required in section 6(k) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.
short_title: Drug Free Public Housing Act of 1989

summary.text: Drug Free Public Housing Act of 1989 - Requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to: (1) review the eviction procedures of all jurisdictions having a public housing authority to determine whether such procedures meet Federal due process standards; and (2) issue a complying jurisdiction a waiver of eviction grievance procedures.

titles.title: Drug Free Public Housing Act of 1989
A bill to provide Public Housing Authorities with waivers of the procedures required in section 6(k) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.
